categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military units

nodes.text: Rebel Honor Guards were a bodyguards of Alliance to Restore the Republic soldiers sworn to defend and protect key members of the Rebellion with their lives. They wore dark buttoned down jackets with pockets, matching pants and black boots. They wore the same helmets as the Alderaanian consular security, and their weapon of choice was the electropole. On the battlefield, they also carried DH-17 blaster pistols.
